API.Cert: <path to TLS certificate, if empty the service starts without TLS in debug mode>

CfgAPI.Cert: <path to TLS certificate, if empty the configuration service starts without TLS in debug mode>

MDES.CallBackURI: <Endpoint cofigured for receivig notifications from MDES site>
MDES.CallBackHostPort: <host and port to listen for call backs>
MDES.TLSCert: <TLS certificate for call back listener, if empty the listener starts without TLS in debug mode>
MDES.EcryptKey: <path to certificate with key for encryption >
MDES.APIKey: <consumer key from MC developer portal project>
